Desc.entry: The biggest free outdoor family show held in August in South Yorkshire with over 25,000 visitors each year. Provides something for everyone including: Sheffield Horticultural Show, a spectacular and authentic historical enactment and living history camp, community entertainment, children's fair rides, community stalls, craft market, food and refreshment stalls. Mobility scooters available for hire. Volunteers welcome. Please check www.eventsheffield.co.uk nearer to the time for further details.

Pubs.entry: Posters; Horticultural Schedules available on website

DisabledAccess.entry: Induction loop only in Community hall, level floor access throughout, Braille signage, car parking, free hire of mobility scooter - book in advance on Tel 286 0400

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Bank holiday Sunday and Monday in August
